inputs.sentence: Apple is looking at buying U.K. startup for $132 billion.

sentence: #Apple is looking at #buying U.K. startup for $132 billion.

inputs.sentence: We had to box part of the pizza to take it home and we were out the door by 6:42.

sentence: We had to #box part of the #pizza to take it home and we were out the door by 6:42.

inputs.sentence: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

sentence: The quick #brown fox #jumps over the lazy dog.

inputs.sentence: Mumbai, Bengaluru, New Delhi are among the many famous places in India.

sentence: #Mumbai, Bengaluru, #NewDelhi are among the many famous places in India.

inputs.sentence: Oh, and their spring rolls and the accompanying peanuts and hot sauces were also delicious.

sentence: Oh, and their #spring rolls and the accompanying peanuts and hot sauces were also delicious.
